title: PepsiCo pushes entrepreneurial collaboration as 'vital' APAC sustainability strategy - FoodNavigator-Asia.com
summary: PepsiCo's APAC Greenhouse Accelerator program, aimed at supporting sustainable innovations, selected Powered Carbon as the winner. Powered Carbon's technology utilizes carbon dioxide to cultivate fungi for eco-friendly fertilizer production, reducing greenhouse gas emissions compared to traditional fertilizers. PepsiCo plans to test this technology on its potato farms in China, with pilot results expected in the fourth quarter of 2023.

title: Global Denim Jeans Strategic Market Report 2023-2030 - Denim Enters Dynamic Times with Innovations to Push ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: The global denim jeans market is projected to reach $114.6 million by 2030, driven by sustained demand and innovations in denim fabrics and styles.  The report highlights the importance of sustainability in the denim industry with innovations like bioindigo dyeing and hemp jeans gaining popularity. China is forecast to be a key growth market for denim jeans.

title: Top 10 Best Paper Manufacturing Companies In India 2024 - Inventiva
summary: India's paper manufacturing industry is undergoing a transformation, with top companies like ITC PSPD, Ballarpur Industries Limited, and JK Paper Limited leading the way in innovation and sustainability. These companies are investing in advanced technologies, eco-friendly practices, and research and development to meet the growing demand for sustainable paper products while minimizing their environmental impact.
